Degree Days

Source: R/data.R
degday.Rd

The monthly accumulated degree days (celsius)

degday

Format

a 3 dimensional array [31 watersheds, 12 months, 21 years]

Details

Accumulated degree days for 1979-1999 For more details see:

  • use this link if in a web browser
